listitem.para: OPENAM-3071: Use custom LoadBalancerEventListener implementation
OPENAM-3064: NPE in DJLDAPv3Repo when requesting filtered role memberships
OPENAM-3045: Enable CLI configurator to set LB_SESSION_HA_SFO
OPENAM-2766: Remote clients that register notification URL's with OpenAM should also attempt to deregister on shutdown.
OPENAM-2765: DirectoryManagerImpl, IdRepoJAXRPCObjectImpl and SMSJAXRPCObjectImpl should return cluster unique ID's when registering notification URL's
OPENAM-2604: Password reset should have configurable mail attribute
OPENAM-2429: The OAuth2 authorization page templates should be moved out of a jar into the WEB-INF/classes directory to allow easier customizations.
OPENAM-2379: Leverage LDAP failover from SDK in LDAP authentication module
OPENAM-2306: Provide a way to supply a keypass for a signing a certificate in an IDP to override the default stored in .keypass file
OPENAM-2258: Enhance the SPACSUtils.processResponseForFedlet to look for the metaAlias in either the URI or the query parameters
OPENAM-2184: Provide a mechanisum to supply static attribute values in IDP and SP SAML2 attribute mappings
OPENAM-2019: New End User management and dashboard pages
OPENAM-1826: Support for Samba4 AD + HeartBeatConnection in ldap auth module
OPENAM-1765: Make the OATH minimum key length configurable
OPENAM-1721: New method in AMLoginModule to allow customers to determine other user sessions
OPENAM-1667: Oracle Directory Server Enteprise Edition should be listed as user data store
OPENAM-1656: Reintroduce generic LDAP data store option on console
OPENAM-1623: Improve the IDPAdapter functionality
OPENAM-1470: Running OpenAM as an SP should not require enabling module based auth
OPENAM-1454: Improve RP support for federation when using DAS
OPENAM-1427: [RFE] support read-only datastore using non-transient NameID during SAML2 federation
OPENAM-1348: Implement get-sub-cfg ssoadm command
OPENAM-1274: Adaptive auth IP range check is not IPv6 aware
OPENAM-1266: Configure option in OpenAM IDP to Proxy all the requests, regardless if the SP allows or not.
OPENAM-1232: Enhance SalesForce workflow
OPENAM-1048: Add client parameter to REST authenticate command
OPENAM-739: Move to maven for the OpenAM build
OPENAM-727: HOTP: Shared key/counter support
OPENAM-625: drop in replacement for the the amsfo sub-system
OPENAM-292: Provide builds of agents that use the same clientsdk as a major or snapshot release of OpenAM
